title: Citi Earns 35 Spots on Bank Investment Consultant's Top 100 Bank Advisors List for 2019
summary: New York - Citi's growing team of Financial Advisors garnered 35 positions on Bank Investment Consultant's annual Top 100 Bank Advisors list, with Citi Personal Wealth Management's Andrew Vahab ranked Number One among advisors in the industry.
tag-1: Citi Earns 35 Spots on Bank Investment Consultant's Top 100 Bank Advisors List for 2019
tag-2: New York – Citi's growing team of Financial Advisors garnered 35 positions on Bank Investment Consultant's annual Top 100 Bank Advisors list, with Citi Personal Wealth Management's Andrew Vahab ranked Number One among advisors in the industry.
tag-3: Financial Advisors Josh Haber and Robert Hanes in New York City and Alex Marks in Chicago were also named to the Top 10.
tag-4: "Over the last year, Citi's U.S. Consumer Bank has implemented a truly client-centric relationship model to seamlessly provide our Citigold clients with the best products, value and convenience across the spectrum of banking, mortgage, and wealth management," said John Cummings, Head of U.S. Consumer Wealth Management. "This industry recognition is a true testament to the outstanding work our team is doing every day."
tag-5: Bank Investment Consultant, a leading online publication for bank-based wealth managers, based its ranking on a composite score that incorporates such measures as production, assets under management and percentage growth in AUM.
tag-6: The following Citi Personal Wealth Management Financial Advisors were named to this year's BIC Top 100:
tag-7: Citi continues to invest in the professional development of its Financial Advisors and Citigold Relationship Managers. This year Citi and the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania marked the fourth anniversary of the Citi Wharton Global Wealth Institute. Since its launch in October 2015, more than 1,000 Citigold Relationship Managers and Citi Personal Wealth Management Financial Advisors have participated in the program. Initially launched in Philadelphia and Beijing, the program has expanded to Mexico City, San Francisco and Cambridge.
tag-8: This year, Citi also introduced enhanced client offerings and capabilities, including Citi Personal Wealth Management's commission-free trading for ETFs and new-issue U.S. Treasury purchases for Citigold clients, as well as the introduction of Citi Wealth Advisor, a digital wealth planning tool. Also this year, Citibank was named as the "Best Bank for High-Net-Worth Families" by Kiplinger's Personal Finance for the third consecutive year and was rated Number One in Customer Satisfaction across retail banking by the American Customer Satisfaction Index.
tag-9: CitiCiti, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
